channel.title: Suggestion: Art Section/Showoff Section
channel.description: There should be an art section in the general column I'd love to show of my banners and GFX

item.title: Suggestion: Art Section/Showoff Section
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:49, topic:403403”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=500462.msg3663179#msg3663179 date=1310461364]
You really think majority of this community will abide by the rules set for the board? I highly doubt many people will post dedicated work, it will just fill up with “Look at my MSPaint skills!!!”.

If you have dedicated work, why not post over at mitb?
[/quote]Bcoz everyone Know that MITB isnt as good as this Community[/quote]
Is hat just your stereotypical opinion? I’m sure if you posted something half decent there they will give positive feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Art Section/Showoff Section
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“tL, post:44, topic:403403”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=500462.msg3661529#msg3661529 date=1310384085]
I don’t see why not one Show-Off board where all that can happen, but your idea is fine with me 2.
[/quote]

You need to prove the idea can work first. If it does, and is a decent contribution to the community. (A contribution doesn’t have to be productive), then I’m sure MITB won’t mind adding one.[/quote]I’ve already did, It’s up to him now,

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Art Section/Showoff Section
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:42, topic:403403”][quote author=tL link=topic=500462.msg3661471#msg3661471 date=1310377291]
Create one, maybe two threads in the general discussion section. One being for art, the other being for what is described as everything else. It has to be tangible stuff you’re showing off though.

Also, whilst I’m for relaxing the moderation on the entire site - just some guidelines on what sort of discussion should be in both. The art/graphics thread would clearly be for responses to people’s art/graphics perhaps discussion on techniques and such.

The other thread’s discussion would be depending on what has just been posted. Someone posts a picture of their new TV, questions/discussion about that TV would carry on.

Show it can be done properly, and maybe you’re in with a chance.
[/quote]I don’t see why not one Show-Off board where all that can happen, but your idea is fine with me 2.[/quote]Nah one Board and then a sub board

Read full topic

Also, whilst I’m for relaxing the moderation on the entire site - just some guidelines on what sort of discussion should be in both. The art/graphics thread would clearly be for responses to people’s art/graphics perhaps discussion on techniques and such.

The other thread’s discussion would be depending on what has just been posted. Someone posts a picture of their new TV, questions/discussion about that TV would carry on.

item.title: Suggestion: Art Section/Showoff Section
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Create one, maybe two threads in the general discussion section. One being for art, the other being for what is described as everything else. It has to be tangible stuff you’re showing off though.

Also, whilst I’m for relaxing the moderation on the entire site - just some guidelines on what sort of discussion should be in both. The art/graphics thread would clearly be for responses to people’s art/graphics perhaps discussion on techniques and such.

The other thread’s discussion would be depending on what has just been posted. Someone posts a picture of their new TV, questions/discussion about that TV would carry on.

Show it can be done properly, and maybe you’re in with a chance.

Read full topic
